acceptance_criteria:
- POST /api/ticks/:id/reject with {feedback} body
- Note added with feedback text
- Verdict field set to 'rejected'
- Tick stays open (returns to agent)
- 400 if tick not awaiting
closed_reason: Added POST /api/ticks/:id/reject endpoint. Accepts JSON body with feedback field, adds note with '(from: human)' prefix if feedback provided, calls ProcessVerdict with rejected verdict. Added RejectTickRequest and RejectTickResponse types. Added comprehensive tests covering terminal/non-terminal awaiting states, validation, and edge cases.
description:
POST /api/ticks/:id/reject endpoint:
- Accepts JSON body with feedback field
- Adds note with feedback (from: human)
- Calls tick.ProcessVerdict with rejected
- Returns updated tick JSON
title: API: Reject tick
